column4: any oen tell me ... if i download Kubuntu can i switch to Ubuntu any time ?
yes, the gnome desktop is just a "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop" away.
just like if you have ubuntu (gnome), the kde desktop is just "sudo apt-get install kubuntu-desktop"
step 1: make sure to have all your data backed up. step 2: fire up gparted, format the win disk into ext3. :)
